meanings.definition: The state of being a coproprietor.
meanings.sent1: In our coproprietorship, we both own the land together.
meanings.sent2: The coproprietorship of the business ensures shared responsibility.
meanings.sent3: Being in a coproprietorship means we have to make decisions together.
meanings.sent4: Their coproprietorship was like a well-oiled machine, working in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The coproprietorship agreement was signed by both parties, sealing their joint ownership.

meanings.definition: A joint ownership or partnership between two or more individuals.
meanings.sent1: The coproprietorship of the house allowed them to split the costs.
meanings.sent2: They entered into a coproprietorship to invest in the property together.
meanings.sent3: Their coproprietorship was like a team, each playing a vital role.
meanings.sent4: The coproprietorship sailed smoothly, with both partners contributing equally.
meanings.sent5: The coproprietorship agreement outlined the rights and duties of each owner.
